education.details: GPA: 3.9/4.0, Coursework: Computer Architecture, Comparison of Learning Algorithms, Computational Theory

responsibilities: Reduced time to render user buddy lists by 75% by implementing a prediction algorithm
Integrated iChat with Spotlight Search by creating a tool to extract metadata from saved chat transcripts
Redesigned chat file format and implemented backward compatibility for search
Designed a UI for the VS open file switcher
